// ==UserScript==
// @name ExtraTorrent.cd
// @description ExtraTorrent
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @connect *://extratorrent.cd/*
// @trackerURL https://extratorrent.cd/
// @version 1.0
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

var code = {
  "version": 2,
  "type": "kit",
  "title": "ExtraTorrent.cd",
  "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
  "desc": "ExtraTorrent",
  "downloadUrl": "",
  "tVersion": "",
  "search": {
    "loginUrl": "",
    "loginFormSelector": "",
    "searchUrl": "https://extratorrent.cd/search/?search=%search% ",
    "nextPageSelector": {
      "selector": "body>table>tbody>tr:eq(2)>td>table>tbody>tr>td:eq(1)>table:eq(2)>tbody>tr>td:eq(0)>a:eq(0)",
      "attr": "href"
    },
    "baseUrl": "https://extratorrent.cd/",
    "requestType": "GET",
    "listItemSelector": "table.tl>tbody>tr",
    "torrentSelector": {
      "categoryTitle": "td.tli>span:eq(0)>a",
      "categoryUrl": {
        "selector": "td.tli>span:eq(0)>a",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "title": "td.tli>a",
      "url": {
        "selector": "td.tli>a",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "size": "td:eq(4)",
      "downloadUrl": {
        "selector": "td:eq(0)>a:eq(1)",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "seed": "td.sn",
      "peer": "td.ln",
      "date": "td:eq(3)"
    },
    "onGetValue": {
      "size": [
        "convertSize"
      ],
      "date": [
        {
          "name": "timeFormat",
          "format": "3"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "uid": 1100354686
};

API_exKit(code);
